the array with processed settings YAP
proccess command line arguments: valid switches are: -b boot file -l load file -L load file, followed by exit -s stack area size (K) -h heap area size -a aux stack size -e emacs_mode -m -DVar=Value reserved memory for alloc IF DEBUG -P only in development versions
